nodes.text: Meedis Minor was an astronomical object located in the Meedis Minor system, a part of the Tandon sector in the Slice portion of the Mid Rim. At one point, a pair of dour ladies were traveling aboard the starliner Pendrake's Horizons that was captured by Thalassian slavers off Phibia, in the Haserian sector. The ladies from Meedis Minor were eventually rescued by the Corellian Security Force agent Bey.

Meedis Minor was originally meant to be mentioned in the 2012 reference book The Essential Guide to Warfare by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart; however, the section that would have mentioned the celestial body was cut before the book's release. The section was itself a revised version of a cut segment originally written by Fry for inclusion in Star Wars Insider 91 in November 2006.

The information regarding Meedis Minor was later released in 2014 as part of Star Wars: The Essential Guide to Warfare Author's Cut, a series of articles published on the StarWars.com Blog by Fry and Erich Schoeneweiss containing various cut content from The Essential Guide to Warfare. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Meedis Minor system, and therefore Meedis Minor itself, in grid square Q-13.
